text: 13.10 Ais 33.1, Jer 15.2, 43.11, Mat 26.52, Lep 14.12 Binɨb God kalabus amnɨgel agɨl nɨgup okok, kalabus amnɨgabal. Binɨb tu palawl ak dɨl puŋɨlel kumnɨgel agɨl nɨgup okok, tu palawl ak dɨl puŋɨlel kumnɨgabal. Tap anɨb ak gɨnɨgeb ñɨn ak, binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal okok, kɨli God nop nokom gos lɨnɨgɨlɨg chɨg tep gɨl mɨdɨlɨg nɨm, gel amnɨmuŋ.
